principalPlaceOfBusinessAddress.title: What is the principal place of business?
principalPlaceOfBusinessAddress.titleHint1: This is the address where the day to day running of the business takes place. It could be the same as the registered office address, or a different address.
principalPlaceOfBusinessAddress.titleHint2: It must be in the jurisdiction where the partnership was formed. It can be changed to an address outside of the jurisdiction after you've registered the partnership.

errorMessages.jurisdictionCountry: You must enter a country that matches your jurisdiction
errorMessages.invalidCharacters: must only include letters a to z, numbers and common special characters such as hyphens, spaces and apostrophes

errorMessages.jurisdictionEnglandAndWales: You must enter a postcode which is in England or Wales
errorMessages.jurisdictionNorthernIreland: You must enter a postcode which is in Northern Ireland
errorMessages.jurisdictionScotland: You must enter a postcode which is in Scotland

registeredOffice.appropriateAddressDetailsPoint1: it is in the jurisdiction where the limited partnership is registered (England and Wales, Northern Ireland, or Scotland)
registeredOffice.appropriateAddressDetailsPoint2: someone acting on behalf of the limited partnership will be made aware of any post addressed and delivered to the limited partnership
registeredOffice.appropriateAddressDetailsPoint3: when the limited partnership receives post at this address, it's possible for the sender to get confirmation of delivery
registeredOffice.appropriateAddressWarning: The address must meet the requirements of an 'appropriate' address. If it does not, the partnership could be struck off the Companies House register.
registeredOffice.newRequirement: This is a new requirement. We do not hold a registered office address for the partnership yet. It may be different from the principal place of business address that we already hold.
registeredOffice.officialCommunication: We'll use this address to send official communications. It must be a physical address in the UK. You cannot use a PO Box address.
registeredOffice.provideNext: You'll need to provide the principal place of business next.

checkYourAnswersPage.title: Check your answers before sending your application
checkYourAnswersPage.futureLawful: I confirm that the intended future activities of the limited partnership are lawful.

warningMessage.warning: This is the last time you'll be able to view sensitive information about the partnership and its partners. To keep a record of this information, print or save the details on this page before you submit.
warningMessage.dob: full dates of birth of any partners who are people
warningMessage.ura: usual residential addresses of any partners who are people

generalPartners.title: General partners
generalPartners.dateEffectiveFrom: Date they became a general partner
generalPartners.changeRemoveOrAdd: Change, remove or add general partners
generalPartners.ceaseDate: Date they ceased to be a general partner

limitedPartners.title: Limited partners
limitedPartners.dateEffectiveFrom: Date they became a limited partner
limitedPartners.changeRemoveOrAdd: Change, remove or add limited partners
limitedPartners.ceaseDate: Date they ceased to be a limited partner

update.title: Check your answers before submitting this update
update.printWarning: Print or save this page before you submit the filing, for your own records.
update.information: We will not send you or the partnership a copy of this information.

companyNumber.whatIsPartnershipNumber: What is the limited partnership number?
companyNumber.hint: This is 2 letters followed by 6 numbers.

confirmLimitedPartnership.title: Confirm this is the correct limited partnership
confirmLimitedPartnership.name: Name

confirmationPage.title: Application submitted
confirmationPage.sentEmailTo: We have sent a confirmation email to
confirmationPage.applicationProcess: We'll process the application as soon as possible. This will usually take no more than 3 to 5 working days.
confirmationPage.applicationAcceptedOrRejected: to let you know if your application has been accepted or rejected.

accepted.title: If the application is accepted
accepted.publicRegister: We'll register the limited partnership and add the details to the Companies House public register.

rejected.title: If the application is rejected
rejected.explain: We'll explain why your application has been rejected and what you can do next. We'll also refund the registration fee.

confirmationPage.processUpdate: We'll process the update as soon as possible. This will usually take no more than 5 working days.
confirmationPage.updatePublicRegister: to confirm when we've updated the information on the public register.

avis.message: What did you think of this service?

postTransition.title: Update submitted
postTransition.registeredOfficeAddress: We've received your filing to update the registered office address for
postTransition.name: We've received your filing to update the name of
postTransition.term: We've received your filing to update the term of the partnership for
postTransition.principalPlaceOfBusinessAddress: We've received your filing to update the principal place of business address for

partner.addPartner: We've received your filing to add
partner.removePartner: We've received your filing to remove
partner.updateWontShow: This update will not show on the public register until we accept the filing.
partner.processFiling: We'll process this filing withing 5 working days, and email
partner.processFilingConfirmation: to let you know if it's been accepted or rejected.
partner.filingAccepted: If it's accepted, we'll update this information on the public register.
partner.filingRejected: If it's rejected, we'll explain why and tell you what to do next.
partner.confirmationStatementTitle: If you need to file a confirmation statement
partner.confirmationStatementBody: As long as all required updates have been submitted, you can file a confirmation statement. You do not need to wait for the updates to be accepted.

continueSavedFilingPage.title: Do you want to continue with a saved filing?
continueSavedFilingPage.hint: If you have saved filings, you can continue with one of these or start a new one

yes.text: Yes, continue with a saved filing
yes.hint: You'll be able to choose which filing you want to continue with

no.hint: This will not delete any saved filings

dateOfUpdate.publicInformationLine1: We'll show the date on the public register.

registeredOfficeAddress.title: When did the registered office address change?

principalPlaceOfBusinessAddress.title: When did the principal place of business address change?

partnershipName.title: When did the name of the partnership change?

emailPage.title: What is the registered email address for the partnership?
emailPage.hint: We'll use this email address to send important information that relates to the partnership. For example, new legislative requirements or warnings about missed deadlines.

publicRegisterInformation.line1: We will not show the registered email address on the public register.

errorPage.title: Service unavailable
errorPage.tryLater: You will be able to use the service at a later date.
errorPage.moreInfo: Email enquiries@companieshouse.gov.uk, if you need more information.

generalPartnerChoicePage.title: Is the general partner a person or a legal entity?

generalPartnersPage.title: You now need to tell us about the general partners
generalPartnersPage.pageInformation: If the partnership has more than one general partner, you'll add them one at a time.
generalPartnersPage.disqualificationStatement: I confirm that the general partner is not disqualified under the directors disqualification legislation, as defined in the Limited Partnership Act 1907.

banner.titleRegistration: This is a new service - your feedback will help us to improve it.
banner.titleTransition: This is a new service - your feedback will help us to improve it.

limitedPartnerChoicePage.isPersonOrLegalEntity: Is the limited partner a person or a legal entity?

limitedPartnersPage.title: You now need to tell us about the limited partners
limitedPartnersPage.pageInformation: If the partnership has more than one limited partner, you'll add them one at a time.

partnershipRulesHint.rules: The partnership name needs to meet set rules. For example, it cannot be the same as another registered partnership or company, or include certain words or phrases.
partnershipRulesHint.rulesLinkStart: To find out more about the rules the limited partnership's name needs to meet,
partnershipRulesHint.rulesLinkEnd: read the guidance on choosing a name (opens in new tab).

namePage.warning: You must check the name meets the rules before you register the partnership. If it does not, we may reject your application, or you may need to change it later.
namePage.title: Limited partnership name
namePage.whatIsName: What's the name of the partnership?
namePage.whatIsNameHint: Do not enter a name ending, like Limited Partnership or LP. We'll add this for you.
namePage.nameEnding: Which name ending would you prefer to go on the public record?
namePage.nameEndingHint: There's no difference between the name endings Limited Partnership, LP and L.P. except how they look.
namePage.nameEndingWelshHint: There's no difference between the name endings Limited Partnership, LP and L.P. except how they look. Partneriaeth Cyfyngedig, PC and P.C. can only be used if the partnership's principal place of business is in Wales.

privateFund.title: Private fund limited partnership name
privateFund.nameEnding: Which private fund limited partnership name ending would you prefer to go on the public record?

scottish.title: Scottish private fund limited partnership name

pageNotFound.title: Page not found
pageNotFound.spelling: If you typed the web address, check it is spelled correctly.
pageNotFound.copiedAddress: If you pasted the web address, check you copied the entire address.
pageNotFound.movedPage: If the web address is correct or you selected a link, the page may have moved.
pageNotFound.goToStartPage: To register a limited partnership, go to the Register a limited partnership start page.

paymentFailedPage.title: Payment failed
paymentFailedPage.reasonHeading: Your application has not been submitted because we have not been able to take payment. This could be because:
paymentFailedPage.error: there was an error (for example, a technical error)
paymentFailedPage.retry: Your application has been saved in Your Filings. To submit the application, you will need to find the application in Your Filings and complete payment.

print.buttonTextNoJs: To print this page, select Print from your browser menu.

publicRegisterInformation.title: What information we'll show on the public register

redesignateToPflpPage.title: Apply for designation as a private fund limited partnership (PFLP)
redesignateToPflpPage.introduction1: A limited partnership can be designated as a PFLP if it is constituted by an agreement in writing and is a collective investment scheme.
redesignateToPflpPage.introduction2: Once the designation has been made, the type of partnership cannot be changed again.

pflpMeanings.capital: Limited partners will no longer be required to contribute capital
pflpMeanings.appoint: Limited partners can appoint a person to wind up the partnership if there is no general partner available to do so
pflpMeanings.agreement: Partners can make an agreement about winding up the partnership
pflpMeanings.risk: Limited partners may take more actions without risking losing their limited liability status
pflpMeanings.admin: Some administrative requirements will be removed
pflpMeanings.scheme: The partnership will no longer qualify as a ‘partnership scheme’, and therefore cannot be an authorised contractual scheme under section 235A(6)(aa) of the Financial Services and Markets Act 2000

redesignateToPflpPage.informationLink: Legislative Reform (Private Fund Limited Partnerships) Order 2017
redesignateToPflpPage.applicationCheck: I/We apply for this firm to be designated as a private fund limited partnership. For that purpose, I confirm that the partnership is constituted by an agreement in writing and is a collective investment scheme within the meaning of section 8D(4) of the Limited Partnerships Act 1907
redesignateToPflpPage.confirmationCheck: I confirm that all general partners have agreed for this application to be made

removePartnerPage.title: Are you sure you want to remove

generalPartnersAdded.title: General partners you have added so far:
generalPartnersAdded.emptyList: You must add at least one General Partner

errorMessage.beforeName: You must provide all information for
errorMessage.afterName: before continuing. Select Change to provide more information

addLimitedPartner.title: Do you need to add another limited partner?

errorMessage.beforeName: You must provide all information for

serviceTransition: Provide new required information about a limited partnership

sicCodePage.title: What is the Standard Industrial Classification (SIC) code?
sicCodePage.hint: You should use the SIC code that best describes the partnership's nature of business.
sicCodePage.find: Find your SIC code using our look up tool (opens in new tab)
sicCodePage.additionalHint: Enter up to 3 additional SIC codes (optional):
sicCodePage.publicRegisterLine1: We'll show the SIC codes on the public register.

signOutPage.title: Are you sure you want to sign out?
signOutPage.saved: How do I find my saved applications?
signOutPage.filingsInfo: Sign in to your Companies House account and select Your filings to access your saved applications.

termPage.title: What is the term of the partnership?
termPage.hint: This is the length of time for which the partnership will be entered into.
termPage.byAgreement: Such term as decided by the partners within the partnership agreement
termPage.untilDissolution: Until a general partner determines the partnership is dissolved
termPage.publicRegisterLine1: We'll show the term of partnership on the public register.

transactionFiled.title: Information has already been provided for the limited partnership
transactionFiled.alreadyReceived: We've already received a filing with the required information for
transactionFiled.acceptedInformation: Once we've accepted this information, it will appear on the public register. You can then make any changes needed using our
transactionFiled.acceptedInformationLink: Find and update company information service

types.LP: Limited partnership in England, Wales or Northern Ireland
types.PFLP: Private fund limited partnership in England, Wales or Northern Ireland

updatePartnerPersonPage.secondNationality: What is their second nationality (if relevant)?
updatePartnerPersonPage.secondNationalityHint: Dual citizenship (also known as dual nationality) is allowed in some countries. This means you can be a citizen of your own country and another country.
updatePartnerPersonPage.publicRegisterLine1: We'll show the month and year of the partner's date of birth, but not the exact date.
updatePartnerPersonPage.publicRegisterLine2: We'll show all the other information you provide on this screen on the public register.

whereIsTheJurisdiction.title: Where is the jurisdiction?
whereIsTheJurisdiction.hint: This is where the partnership was formed. The registered office address and principal place of business will need to be in the same jurisdiction.

scotland.title: This partnership will be registered in Scotland
scotland.information: This means the partnership's registered office address and principal place of business will need to be in Scotland. Select to continue, if this is correct.
scotland.ifNotScotland: If these addresses are in England, Wales or Northern Ireland, you will need to go back to change the type of partnership you are registering.

partnershipTypePage.title: Which type of partnership do you want to register?

countries.congoTheDemocraticRepublicOfThe: Congo, the Democratic Republic of the
countries.saintHelenaAscensionAndTristanDaCunha: Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha
